Bushmaster Firearms International based in Carson City, Nevada, United States, is an American manufacturer and distributor of firearms. The company's product line revolves around semi-automatic pistol and rifle variants of the M4 / AR-15 design. Now made with 100% US materials and parts.

April 19, 2025 - In January 2020, the parent entity, Remington Outdoor Company, announced that it would focus operations on its core hunting and shooting brands: AAC, Barnes, Remington, and Marlin. It also announced that it would no longer produce Bushmaster, TAPCO, DPMS, and StormLake Barrels.

s: May 4, 1999 - The bushmaster (genus Lachesis) is the longest venomous snake in the New World. It is found in scrublands and forests from the Amazon River basin north to Costa Rica. t: Is Bushmaster a reputable brand for the AR-15? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 5): Eh, it’s okay. It’s not 2003 anymore when your choices for a decent AR were “ABCD” (Armalite, Bushmaster, Colt, DPMS) There are LOTS of really good manufactures out there these days. I’d be a bit hesitant since they were purchased by Remington, but only just.
